room_title: Escape room "Solvit Funeral Home" by Bayou Escape Rooms in Lake Charles
review: Wow! We escaped with just one minute left on the clock. The Funeral Home room was incredible. The staff was super nice and provided the necessary hints, the rest was up to us and we did it! We are definitely going back soon! It was hard but fun!

room_title: Escape room "Solvit Funeral Home" by Bayou Escape Rooms in Lake Charles
review: We escaped the funeral home room! It was more challenging than we expected - worth every penny for the fun we had. The owners are friendly and helpful. We cannot wait to try another room.
